About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment Tuesdays and Thursdays during school terms. General reference service available.

About.Access: Most records open. Some restricted because of privacy issues.

About.Acquisition focus: Records and artefacts relating to the foundation, development and activities of the School since its foundation in 1878.

About.Major holdings:
Enrolment Book, 1888-1972
	Prospectuses, 1885-
	Photographs, 1882-
	Ruyton Board minutes, 1930-
	Artefacts - e.g. uniforms, badges, trophies

About.References:
Daniell, Hilda. History of Ruyton 1878 – 1956, Ramsay,Ware Publishing, 1956. 
	
	
	
	
	Theobald, Marjorie. Ruyton Remembers 1878 – 1978, Hawthorn Press, 1978.
